text.section: The rights and powers of attorney of a reciprocal insurer shall be as provided in the power of attorney given it by the subscribers.

The terms of any power of attorney or agreement collateral thereto shall be reasonable and equitable, and no such power or agreement, or any amendment thereof, shall be used or be effective in this state until approved by the commissioner.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1376, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 27, sec. 8, effective June 18, 1970.
